projects.title: West Darfur Arms Registration and Marking Project
projects.description: I was hired as an independent consultant to study the project and suggest improvements. I visited the project in West Darfur in August 2013 and reported on my findings in Khartoum in February 2014. My report was published by the Bonn International Center for Conversion, www.bicc.de in late 2014.

profile_positions.description: My consultancy assignment ran from May to December 2017. During this period, I was mostly based in Juba, working with organizations established by the peace agreement ARCSS, the government, international organizations and civil society.

profile_positions.description: I taught courses on International Politics, Political Violence, Negotiation, International Organization and Internal War as an International Problem. I also supervised B.A., M.A. and PhD theses.
